page.title: 17EDUCATION I
page.content:
INTRODUCTION
The children of Cummertrees Parish are educated well. They start school when they are 4\ to 5 .When pupils are ready to leave secondary school they are either 16,17,or 18.
PRIMARY EDUCATION
Cummertrees School is a primary school .Children from the age of 5 to 12,are taught by three lady teachers.There are 48 pupils in the school . Through the years the school roll has varied. Cummertrees Primary school is over 1OO years old, and is built of sandstone .The school has two modern extensions built on.
